ai-tika-vin02t12:4_0: The discussion on unfinished dwellings is finished.
ai-tika-vin02t12:5_0: The account of the invitation of the invitation procedure
ai-tika-vin02t12:6_0: Or alternatively, when the invitation procedure is complete, the fourteenth, fifteenth, and the eighth day of the lunar half-month, the rainy season, or the king’s invitation. Or the smallest extent newly arrived monks should be understood to say: “You may interval the first or the rainy season.”
ai-tika-vin02t12:6_1: In the Mahākappina, this is how there comes to be this one of two or three invitations. When there is a fourteenth day of the points, one is needed to show the rains residence, one who is mindful in order to do the invitation procedure, one who is needed to see the physical contact with the two ends. And one who is building a shrine, even if it is not allowed to go away at the Cetiya mountain rains.

ai-tika-vin02t12:15_0: On the Pathing of the invitation procedure
ai-tika-vin02t12:16_1: The invitation has been given to one of the invitation procedure. All of them has been given to them by one. And the giver is given to them according to the rule.
ai-tika-vin02t12:16_2: Those newly arrived monks did not get furniture. If they had a dwelling, they thought, “If their dwellings don’t come.”
ai-tika-vin02t12:16_3: But after doing the invitation procedure, he leaves the monastery while returning, and having an agreement about the invitation procedure. When it is finished, the invitation procedure is left unity in the Sangha.
ai-tika-vin02t12:16_4: Now, the castegories were mentioned in the texts, ~ on the fourteenth part.
